meanings.definition: A condition in which bleeding occurs from the nose.
meanings.sent1: She got nosebleeds after bumping her nose.
meanings.sent2: Nosebleeds are common in dry weather.
meanings.sent3: During the play, the clown's fake nosebleeds made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her nosebleeds of emotion overflowed during the touching movie scene.
meanings.sent5: The sight of his nosebleeds made her queasy.

meanings.definition: A nosebleed can be caused by various factors such as dry air or injury.
meanings.sent1: He had frequent nosebleeds due to the dry climate.
meanings.sent2: The child's nosebleed stopped after applying pressure.
meanings.sent3: The magician pretended his nosebleeds were part of the act.
meanings.sent4: Her nosebleeds of regret stained her cheeks.
meanings.sent5: The intensity of his nosebleeds surprised the doctor.
